title: Slow Cooker Bbq Shredded Chicken
directions: Cook for 5 to 7 hours on LOW. If desired, you can lift out the chicken and reduce the sauce in a separate pan on the stovetop, but this may not be necessary; it simply depends on your preference.
ingredients: 3 to 4 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, or a mix of thighs and breasts
1 1/2 cups (12 ounces) barbecue sauce, store-bought or homemade, plus more for serving
